translations: n.女神；居于山林水泽的仙女；美丽的少女；蛹

phrs.translation: 宁芙, 若虫, 女神
蜂鸟, 森林中的女神
水中女仙, 睡莲, 茨藻
内克尔仙女号, 内克仙女号, 水精灵奈克尔

sentences.sentence: He also owns a 105 ft, high-tech catamaran called the Necker Nymph.
sentences.translation: 他还拥有一艘105英尺高的高科技双体船，名为 Necker Nymph。

sentences.sentence: Doing that will also allow you, for a further $25, 000, to take charge of Necker Nymph, the three-seater submarine for the week.
sentences.translation: 这样做，你只要再加25000美元就可租用他的三座潜艇尼克女神号一周。

sentences.sentence: After lunch there will be a walk in the grounds of the chateau to see the Jugendstil nymph fountains, a work dating from 1903 by Walter Schott.
sentences.translation: 午餐后，我们将在城堡内散步，参观“青年派”风格女神雕像喷泉，这是沃尔特·肖特1903年创作的作品。
